title: Suno — AI Tool Review
description: Suno is an AI music generator that creates full songs with vocals, instruments, and production quality from simple text prompts. Suno is the leading AI music generation platform that can create complete, radio-quality songs from text descriptions. Users describe the genre, mood, and theme, and Suno generates original music with vocals, melody, harmony, and production — in seconds. V4 supports longer tracks, better voice quality, and stems export. Used by millions for content creation, jingles, and musical exploration. Highlights: Full songs with vocals from text prompts. Radio-quality audio output. Multiple genre support. Fast generation. Free tier available.
